abilities.name: Healing Fire
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Blaine's Ninetales, remove 1 damage counter from it, if it has any. This power stops working while Blaine's Ninetales is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Burn Up
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Blaine's Ninetales.
